item.title: Quick script: backup multiple Alcatel Omniswitch configuration files
item.description: A quick batch script I did to backup configuration files of multiple Alcatel Omniswitch via FTP. All files are named boot.cfg so the script renames each file appending the IP address. Create a file with all the IP of switches to backup - iplist.txt 10.10.29.10 10.12.29.10 10.14.29.10 10.14.29.11 10.14.29.12 10.14.29.13 10.14.29.14 10.14.29.15 Create a FTP script to login and backup the configuration file - ftp.scr Note: user admin password switch are defaults on Omniswitch
